entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Move OIDC PKCE state #41548
  • Make it possible for me to opt out of ThrowIfRecordTypeHasValidationOnProperties or ignore if attribute IS present on params #41546
  • Support binding request body as Stream in Controller Actions #41540
    .NET 7 Planning
  • my token is always null in app Blazor server Net 6 VS 2022 #41539
  • Add ability to register IHubContext<T> service in DI #41538
  • Potential memory leak with Blazor Webassembly when using an iframe in a razor component #41537
  • Add CancellationToken overloads for reading multipart form sections #41532
  • Duplicate registration in ServicesCollection on AspNetCore. #41530
  • With "Do not use top-level statements" checked, in Blazor WebAssembly App/ Blazor Server App/gRPC, the namespace is "Company.WebApplication1" rather than the solution name. #41529
    6.0.x
  • Blazor, OnTimeUpdate and similar events: make argument more specific and clear #41528
  • Perf regression: https, json #41527
  • Perf improvement: caching, caching #41526
  • Add structured header parser #41524
  • The type or namespace 'Internal' does not exist in the namespace 'Microsoft.AspnetCore.Http'. Are you missing an assembly reference? #41522

Closed

  • EnableBuffering/FileBufferingReadStream doesn't support 0-byte reads #41287
    6.0.6
  • Http.Sys request body does not support 0-byte reads #41305
    6.0.6
  • SNI configuration doesn't allow multiple hostnames of same length #41216
    6.0.6
  • Question: In Blazor Wasm, is it possible to capture the generated html from a Blazor component? #41508
  • Blazor Server Windows Authentication : Trust Relationship between this workstation and the primary domain failed. #41512
  • Undo workarounds added to dockerfile while updating to 7.0 SDK #37406
  • .Net 5 to .Net 6 migration breaking integration tests in docker, works ok in local #41509
  • Abort gracefully closes the response rather than aborting it #31404
    6.0.x
  • StaticWebAssets.xml not found when using SDK 6.0.100 and targeting NET5 #38726
    .NET 7 Planning
  • dotnet watch hangs while a Time Machine backup is being run on macOS Monterey #41257
    Backlog
  • MultipartReader.ReadNextSectionAsync() causes error "Unexpected end of Stream" #41313
  • Blazor navigation not work properly on Safari iOS latest #41390
  • Create new Web API using `dotnet new webapi` with use-minimal-apis and use-program-main options set, you get a warning on build #41491
    7.0-preview5

PullRequests

Created

  • Port template test fixes from release/6.0 #41549
    area-mvc
  • Use 1es-windows-2019 again #41547
    area-infrastructure
  • Fix description for MultipartReader.BodyLengthLimit #41479 #41543
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Implemented test to monitor issue 4754 #41542
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Fix templates sourceName & port of template fixes from main #41536
    area-mvc, 6.0.x
  • Fix failing test on machine using en-GB #41534
    area-security, community-contribution
  • Add CancellationToken overloads for reading multipart form sections #41533
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Pass through CancellationToken #41531
    area-security, community-contribution
  • Update Grpc.Core.Api version to 2.45.0 and support write cancellation #41525
    area-grpc
  • Add support for HttpBody to gRPC JSON transcoding #41523
    area-grpc

Merged

  • Update SPA template JS dependencies #41514
    area-mvc, tell-mode, 3.1.x
  • [release/3.1] Fix component government bugs #41160
    area-infrastructure, 3.1.x
  • Try new docker image #41194
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview5
  • Determine next log file number from directory on first run #41492
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, community-contribution, 6.0.6
  • Remove release/5.0 Dependabot config #41541
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview5
  • Allow HttpSys zero-byte reads #41500
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 6.0.6
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `af29db7` to `8ded48c` #41462
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • Give `$(DotnetEfVersion)` readable casing #41484
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview5
  • [release/5.0] Fix CompGov bugs #41179
    area-infrastructure, 5.0.x
  • Add rule to seal internal and private types #41457
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview5
  • Fix MapPath and UsePathBase's use of implicit PathStrings #41382
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 6.0.6
  • Support minimal APIs & program/main together in Web API template #41499
    area-mvc, 7.0-preview5

Updated

  • Add dotnet dev-jwts tool #41520
    area-commandlinetools
  • JSON "null" request body rejected as an empty request body #41002
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Partition some pools by core #40476
    Perf, area-runtime
  • Add `AddStackExchangeRedisCache` & `AddHsts` overload #40689
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Add linefeed line terminator switch #41101
    area-runtime, 6.0.x
  • Surrogate argument list in Minimal APIs #41325
    area-web-frameworks
